documents.document: @Gingerheaddad that was a fantastic sketch
@ChloeMugg that's how I start my mornings. She's the Booger queen.
@ChloeMugg that's hard. Hope his breaks soon and the baby doesn't suffer too poorly
@ChloeMugg holy crap! B had fevers that high with roseola
@ChloeMugg my uncle is a newf so I'm partially fluent ;)
@ChloeMugg oh is he related to my husband?
@ChloeMugg advil and tylenol.....stay hydrated
How quiet would my feed be if I muted everyone who mentions or RT something about Trump?
.@tdsb I emailed the school 3 weeks ago and still no response.
Can someone tell me if there are open house days BEFORE registering for JK 2017? @tdsb
@ChloeMugg he sounds perfect for the long haul. I'm glad you can count on hi.
I power cleaned the bathroom floor. Porous tile grout is horrible for a bathroom. Vinegar & baking soda makes a satisfying fizz.
@Lizbeth_City mine give me a few hours at most. Though I get wicked nightmares if they hit in the night.
@Lizbeth_City @Sher_Khan I woke up with one in the night through to this morning but I think it was dehydration more than anything.
@pregnantwhiner I give a lecture that it wasn't made easily. I worked hard!
We are proudly one of this number! Baby Z was born in the Cedar Room! https://t.co/aPieDngvc5
@Kainin shut up. That means I'm *that* much closer to 35.
@ChloeMugg oh that's horrible poor bub.
@ChloeMugg saline drops don't help? I have to clear Z daily
Tomorrow is Groundhog Day. It's my favourite holiday! #seriously

@Kainin you mean a car out Baci?
I'll see myself out.
@shawnmicallef "cholera flaps" is my new favourite phrase.
In non political news: Baby Z gave her first laugh out loud. Full belly baby giggle!
My beautiful blue teapot has a fatal crack. #teadrinker Guess I can repurpose it as flowerpot and still enjoy it.… https://t.co/F1fsSUia0i
@filmcraft_ check Craigslist for some? Maybe they can be cheaply replaced?
That satisfying feeling when the kitchen is clean and the coffee is hot. #domesticbliss
She's 3 months old. Growing like a weed. She's pushing 17 pounds! #hipdysplasia #pavlikharness https://t.co/jvKsKBP6SE
@Lizbeth_City booooo switch pharmacy?
Halfway through Baby Z's #pavlikharness! Six more weeks to go! #hipdysplasia
@ChloeMugg and my husband reminds me of this fact when I get down on myself.
@ChloeMugg this was me for sure last time. And the first shrink wanted me to supplement and start solids at 4m When I said no she berated me
@Lizbeth_City past 2 days have had low pressure so we've felt sluggish. Maybe that?
@emiiilyt she's almost half way through. Doing amazing should be out in 6 weeks!
@PialiRoy meds. Therapy and supportive family and friends.
@TheresaPolyakov we are still deciding between the tcdsb Ukrainian extended day or tdsb french immersion.
This is the second time I've had postpartum depression. This is the second time I'll fight it and win. #BellLetsTalk #endthestigma #ppd
You know what's amazing? OHIP covered therapy & health insurance for the meds I need to beat postpartum depression. #BellLetsTalk #ppd
Well baby Z has passed the weight limit on the bassinet....probably over a week ago. So off it goes. Now just the baby jail.
@LanieLou57 what's on your rocking chairs?
"Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2" is essentially "Jurassic Park 2".... I clearly watch too much Netflix. #breastfeeding
@ChloeMugg meds and therapy. #PPD 2nd time. Hit harder and faster this time.
@ChloeMugg this was me exactly this time too. Felt I ruined big brother's life.... hugs #BellLetsTalk
Postpartum Depression can hit hard and fast. Don't suffer in silence. #ppd #BellLetsTalk
My tea devotion started early.... this tea set had plates and cutlery too. #teadrinker https://t.co/quYPAI5ayF
If James Earl Jones does voices for both Mufasa and Darth Vader... does that make Simba a Jedi? #StarWars #Disney #NerdParent
@Kainin @L0Litsmonica and then you're stuck forever with me.
@goldsounder @renbostelaar I think this is the case. Verified accounts have an option the rest of us don't.
My husband irrationally hates my current snapchat filter obsession. No sense of the ha ha.
@ChloeMugg if it means we get to hear your accent....then Yes By!
@ChloeMugg now that's a big mess. ...but aren't you frozen solid now in your area? ?
@ChloeMugg it's a dry mess. He didn't fall off the counter....the baby didn't get a taste.... #brightside
@IanConway last time I encountered her she made not so subtle racist comments of the "help our own first" variety.
Someone said my daughter's name is "unique" through pursed lips and scrunched nose... I know what that's code for.
@Lizbeth_City found it! On the app it's under settings > display &sound > accessibility
@Lizbeth_City thanks!
@Lizbeth_City where would we find that function?
@Kainin and diabetes. That heart is full of diabetes.
Used it a few too many times.... https://t.co/STFvse9X4m
Tried a smoked butterscotch latte from s'bucks and was disappointed especially when I reached the bottom where all the syrup settled.
Hip Clinic Day! Baby Z isprogressing amazingly; gets an hour out a day now. Yay bathing! #hipdysplasia… https://t.co/Rh27sR54Lp
@Kainin if you survive it you're doing better than him? Most historic year?
@Kainin it's your "Jesus Year"!!!
Went through my Amazon wishlist and found shows I was going to buy my mom. Grief pops up from the most innocent endeavors.
Dude from the @CCSGTA knocked on our door. Said not interested, he said wasn't asking for anything. Just sharing info. THEN asked for $$
Tonight was the first time in 12 weeks I had an hour completely to myself.
@emiiilyt time to change the password?
@Lizbeth_City darn. Today is a take out kinda day. Or soup.
Three separate EB subway delays on my way to an appt this morning. I'm so glad I don't take the subway regularly. Super crowded too. #ttc
@Lizbeth_City it was super icy this morning. Put makeup on and order takeout....
This is great news for ON. It helped us so much to have unlimited time with my mother in the end at the hospital in… https://t.co/qArCYcEjYz
It's a thin, slippery glaze of ice on everything. Commute safely!
That moment when you read a "5 signs" list and realize you're surrounded....
I wish sellers on Craigslist would learn the meaning of "mint condition". You can't call it both mint AND gently used.
@Lizbeth_City I've learned "to code" is a far cry from "useful".
There's no teapot emoji!?!?
In #GameOfThrones where is the Red Waste filmed? #GoT
Baby Z has started showing teething signs. Only Elvis and rubbing her gums make her happy. #sendcaffeine #andsnacks
I may stop buying dystopian novels to focus on the daily news.
@daisyJD that's adorable
Antivax dude gets the job.... we may need to delay any trips south of the 49th until after Baby Z is done her full vax schedule.
@Kainin triple threat!
Baby Z settles down for music. She likes Elvis! #BurningLove
@Kainin but you have never bragged about an umbrella!

@Kainin bets on how long it takes for you to forget it on transit?
I'm guessing 3 months.
@Lizbeth_City I'm just starting out.
@Lizbeth_City actually more than one
@Lizbeth_City which one? I just started watching and I've seen problematic one already
Eating cake and drinking coffee for breakfast. This is how you adult right?!?
@Kainin drive safe. It's snowing pretty steady here too.
@mrtimlong @annetdonahue @BrentButt and like a good kid in tried to give back the money because I thought it was accidentally in there.
@mrtimlong @annetdonahue @BrentButt I almost choked on a dime covered in wax paper....
@EmilyBat it was pretty decent until the boat slammed into the port. Then it jumped the shark.
@adamed both.
@annetdonahue my friend did but they were Persian.
@ChloeMugg it's not a wastebif it makes you feel better for the rest of the day.
@EmilyBat I'll rewatch it and let you know...
@EmilyBat I remember seeing it in theatre because it was super hot out and my friends and I wanted ac....I don't remember despising it.
@Vandamir she looks like the torti we had when I was a teen.
Vachon's Billot Log cakes are so much more magical than I remember. #fatkid
@emiiilyt @Outpost_Coffee both!!!
